name: Slider You-n v 1.2
author: giacomo@you-n.com

sections.description:
A simple and full customizable WordPress plugin for slideshow, responsive version included

Credits

Includes
BlockUI (http://www.malsup.com/jquery/block/), Cycle (http://jquery.malsup.com/cycle/options.html), File uploader (http://github.com/valums/file-uploader), Timthumb (http://timthumb.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/timthumb.php)
sections.installation:
Installing The Plugin

Either use the built in plugin installation feature of WordPress, or extract all files from the ZIP file, making sure to keep the file structure intact, and then upload it to /wp-content/plugins/.
Then just visit your admin area and activate the plugin.
That’s it!

Configuring The Plugin

Go to the settings page and choose your preferite settings.
